title: BRIEF-Growthpoint Properties FY HEPS 158.1 Cents
text:
BRIEF-Growthpoint Properties FY HEPS 158.1 Cents

Stock Markets 40 minutes ago (Sep 11, 2019 09:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Growthpoint Properties FY HEPS 158.1 Cents Sept 11 (Reuters) - Growthpoint Properties Ltd : * FY REVENUE INCREASED BY 5.7% TO R11.6BN COMPARED TO R10.9BN FOR COMPARATIVE PERIOD * FY HEADLINE EARNINGS PER SHARE DECREASED BY 1.1% TO 158.10 CENTS COMPARED TO 159.84 CENTS * FY NET ASSET VALUE PER SHARE DECREASED BY 0.7% TO 2 539 CENTS * DIVIDEND INCREASED BY 4.6% TO 218.1 CENTS PER SHARE

BRIEF-Growthpoint Properties FY HEPS 158.1 Cents
